title: Early trick films [1898-1912]
brief_description: Compilation including “The House that Jack built” (dir. G.A. Smith); “Upside down or the human flies” (dir. R.W. Paul); “The Brahmin and the butterfly” (dir. Georges Melies); “The Motorist” (dir. R.W. Paul); “The Magic screen”; “Dante’s inferno”; and in its entirety, “The Invisible thief”.
